SOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Ik Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
April 7, I960
Mr. Samuel L. Becker, Director
Division of Television-Radio-Film
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Thanks for your note about Dick Evans* article. I queried Editor
Betty who says: "Dick Evans and I are operating on the theory that
it will appear in the Journal. He is incorporating some suggestions
made by Becker etc., which will make it less a speech and more an
article.
"It shouldn*t be any longer than the Emery article which is in the
March-April Journal."
In this way reprints are always possible.
Harry J. Skornia,
President

CC: Mr. Dick Evans
